Articles.Content:
I'm setting up a space station for research/refueling,but I can't figure out how to transfer fuel from docked craft to the station itself.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T04:32:30Z" title="05/02/2015 04:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Grenartia**
Right click on a tank, then hit Alt[mod key]+right click to open the transfer window.
Also, if you are in career mode, you need to make sure the R&D center is upgraded at least once. (Which I think it should be if you have docking ports.)
Thanks, I had a feeling it'd be something ridiculously simple like that. And yeah, I've got fully upgraded everything.
